name: arab
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person from Western Asia or North Africa who speaks Arabic as a first language
(also Arab horse) a horse from a breed originally from Arabia, with a high tail and a particular shape of head: He was a breeder of Arab horses. She was riding a chestnut Arab gelding. Synonym
Arabian

a person whose language is Arabic, an important language of the Middle East, or who comes from an Arabic-speaking country, esp. in the Middle East
